original: 佛說持明藏瑜伽大教尊那菩薩🔽大明成就儀軌經卷第一
analyzed: 佛說持明藏瑜伽大教尊那菩薩 大明成就儀軌經卷第一
translated: The Yoga of the Mahayoga Tantra of the Glorious Esoteric Community Called the Adamantine Pinnacle, Fascicle One🔽The Yoga of the Mahayoga Tantra of the Glorious Esoteric Community Called the Adamantine Pinnacle, Fascicle One

original: 1 大明成就分大明成就分第一
analyzed: 1 大明成就分大明成就分第一
translated: The Yoga of the Mahayoga Tantra of the Glorious Esoteric Community Called the Adamantine Pinnacle, Fascicle One🔽Nāgârjuna Bodhisattva's Abridged Version of the Yoga of the Esoteric Treasury, Translated from the Western Regions by the Tripiṭaka Master Chao San Da Fu Shi Guang Lu Qing Ming Jiao Da Shi Chen Fa Xian, in Accordance with the Edict of the Emperor

original: 龍樹菩薩於持明藏略出西天譯經三藏朝散大夫試光祿卿明教大師臣法賢奉　詔譯爾時世尊言。
analyzed: 龍樹菩薩於持明藏略出西天譯經三藏朝散大夫試光祿卿明教大師臣法賢奉　詔譯爾時世尊言。
translated: At that time, the World-Honored One said:

original: 此大毘盧遮那如來瑜伽大教。
analyzed: 此大毘盧遮那如來瑜伽大教。
translated: This yoga of the Mahāvairocana Tathāgata is
If there are good men
Who wish to cultivate the methods of all accomplishments,

original: 應於是教尊那菩薩大明法中。
analyzed: 應於是教尊那菩薩大明法中。
translated: They should in this teaching, the great mantra method of Bodhisattva Sūna,
Single-mindedly concentrate and diligently cultivate.
In their aspirations and requests, there is nothing that will not be accomplished.
If there are practitioners
Who wish to perform the most supreme and excellent accomplishments,
First, on the great ocean shore,
Recite the fundamental great mantra of Bodhisattva Sūna.

original: 造沙塔六洛叉得數滿已。
analyzed: 造沙塔六洛叉得數滿已。
translated: Build sand stupas to the number of six lakṣas, and when the count is complete,
One will surely attain accomplishment in the sought-after matter.

original: 復次若欲求見觀自在菩薩。
analyzed: 復次若欲求見觀自在菩薩。
translated: Next, if one wishes to see Avalokitêśvara Bodhisattva,

original: 或多羅菩薩或金剛手菩薩等。
analyzed: 或多羅菩薩或金剛手菩薩等。
translated: or Tārā Bodhisattva, or Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva, and so forth,
as before, one cultivates.
These bodhisattvas will surely manifest their bodies,
comfort the practitioner, and fulfill their wishes.
Up to this, or if one performs the rites of respect and love,

original: 或求種種聖藥。🔽或求阿蘇囉王位。
analyzed: 或求種種聖藥。 或求阿蘇囉王位。
translated: or seeks various holy medicines,🔽or seeks the position of an asura king,
or seeks the position of a celestial general,
such matters will surely be accomplished.
If one cultivates for a long time, focuses single-mindedly, and does not retreat,

original: 乃至菩薩之位亦可獲得。
analyzed: 乃至菩薩之位亦可獲得。
translated: up to the stage of a bodhisattva, one may also attain it.

original: 復次行人若於佛塔前或菩提道場。
analyzed: 復次行人若於佛塔前或菩提道場。
translated: Next, if the practitioner, in front of a Buddha stupa or a Bodhi tree site,
recites the great mantra one koṭi times,
when the recitation is completed, one attains arhatship.
In this very body, one gains the benefit of being able to speak.

original: 此後與阿羅漢同行亦同其威德。
analyzed: 此後與阿羅漢同行亦同其威德。
translated: After this, one's conduct is the same as an arhat, and one's majestic virtue is also the same.

original: 又復行人往前正覺山頂。
analyzed: 又復行人往前正覺山頂。
translated: Moreover, the practitioner should go to the peak of Samyak-sambuddha Mountain.
In front of the Buddha's stupa, always hold a bowl of food.
Recite the great mantra one koṭi times.
When the recitation is complete,
one will see Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva.

original: 菩薩自引行人入吉祥門。
analyzed: 菩薩自引行人入吉祥門。
translated: The Bodhisattva will personally lead the practitioner into the Auspicious Gate.
The Bodhisattva will tell the practitioner, You enter this gate.
There are no demons or difficulties, and all wishes will be fulfilled.
Free from all fears, you will experience great joy.
In the future, you will see Maitreya.

original: 聞說妙法證菩薩地乃至或得阿吠嚩哩底迦菩薩之位。
analyzed: 聞說妙法證菩薩地乃至或得阿吠嚩哩底迦菩薩之位。
translated: Hearing the wonderful Dharma, you will realize the bodhisattva stage, and even attain the position of a bodhisattva of the Avaivartika stage.

original: 又復行人或往尾補羅山頂。
analyzed: 又復行人或往尾補羅山頂。
translated: Moreover, the practitioner may go to the peak of Vipula Mountain.
Always clean and hold a bowl of food.
In front of an image containing relics,

original: 隨力備辦香花燈塗而作供養。
analyzed: 隨力備辦香花燈塗而作供養。
translated: prepare incense, flowers, lamps, and ointments to the best of one's ability and make offerings.
Recite the great mantra three lakṣas.
When the recitation is complete,
the practitioner should prepare extensive offerings separately.
The practitioner should increase cleanliness and observe the precepts even more.

original: 至十五日竟日連夜持誦不輟。
analyzed: 至十五日竟日連夜持誦不輟。
translated: On the fifteenth day, recite continuously throughout the day and night without stopping.

original: 金剛手菩薩決定現身引接行人。
analyzed: 金剛手菩薩決定現身引接行人。
translated: Bodhisattva Vajrapāṇi will definitely appear in person to lead the practitioner.
Going to his own palace and roaming the auspicious gate,

original: 令行人入得延壽命齊於日月。
analyzed: 令行人入得延壽命齊於日月。
translated: causing the practitioner to attain longevity equal to that of the sun and moon.

original: 又復行人往三道寶堦佛塔之處。
analyzed: 又復行人往三道寶堦佛塔之處。
translated: Moreover, the practitioner goes to the place of the three jeweled stairs and the Buddha's stupa,
always holding a bowl of food and circumambulating the Buddha's stupa to the right,
reciting the great mantra one koṭi times.
When the number of recitations is complete,

original: 得見無能勝及訶利帝等所求如意。
analyzed: 得見無能勝及訶利帝等所求如意。
translated: one will be able to see Aparājitā and Hārītī, and whatever is sought will be as one wishes.
Hārītī will lead the practitioner
to her own palace and give various holy medicines.
Aparājitā will appear in person

original: 為行人說法令證菩提道及授與聖藥。
analyzed: 為行人說法令證菩提道及授與聖藥。
translated: and speak the Dharma for the practitioner, causing them to realize the path of enlightenment and bestowing holy medicines.
Transforming the practitioner's body, endowing it with supreme characteristics,

original: 及得一切菩薩接引證道。
analyzed: 及得一切菩薩接引證道。
translated: and attaining the guidance and realization of the path by all bodhisattvas,
up to quickly sitting at the site of enlightenment.
This is the great mantra of the Venerable One.

original: 乃是一切如來及諸菩薩同所宣說。
analyzed: 乃是一切如來及諸菩薩同所宣說。
translated: It is what all Tathāgatas and Bodhisattvas proclaim together.
It can bring great benefits to sentient beings.

original: 乃至獲得無上正等正覺。
analyzed: 乃至獲得無上正等正覺。
translated: Up to attaining supreme perfect enlightenment.
Furthermore, if there are sentient beings
Who commit great evil karma without any good seeds,
They will not be able to give rise to the bodhi mind.
The factors of enlightenment will never be attained.
Such a person may suddenly encounter a spiritual friend
Who recites this great mantra once it passes through their ear faculty.
Their grave offenses will be reduced and good seeds will immediately be planted.

original: 何況行人恒常持誦專注精懃。
analyzed: 何況行人恒常持誦專注精懃。
translated: How much more so for practitioners who always recite it with focused and diligent concentration.

original: 如是之人求成就者決定獲得。🔽2 觀智成就分1觀智成就分第二之一復次行人。
analyzed: 如是之人求成就者決定獲得。 2 觀智成就分1觀智成就分第二之一復次行人。
translated: Such people who seek accomplishment will definitely attain it.
If one wishes to cultivate the methods for accomplishing all things,
One must first cultivate the wisdom of contemplation.
And all the mudra seals must be thoroughly mastered.

original: 無使謬誤方可求諸悉地。
analyzed: 無使謬誤方可求諸悉地。
translated: Without making mistakes, one may then seek all kinds of spiritual powers.

original: 若於尊那菩薩法中求悉地者。
analyzed: 若於尊那菩薩法中求悉地者。
translated: If one seeks spiritual powers in the methods of the Bodhisattva Sūnyatā,

original: 先觀尊那菩薩根本微妙字輪安自身分。
analyzed: 先觀尊那菩薩根本微妙字輪安自身分。
translated: First, contemplate the subtle maṇḍala of the root syllables of Bodhisattva Sūnyatā and place them on one's body parts.

original: 所謂觀唵字安頭上。🔽觀左字安兩目。🔽觀隷字安項頸。
analyzed: 所謂觀唵字安頭上。 觀左字安兩目。 觀隷字安項頸。
translated: Namely, contemplate the syllable Oṃ and place it on the head.🔽Contemplate the syllable Zā and place it on the two eyes.🔽Contemplate the syllable Li and place it on the neck.
Contemplate the syllable Cū and place it on the two arms.

original: 復觀隷字安心上。🔽觀尊字安於臍中。🔽觀禰字安兩股。
analyzed: 復觀隷字安心上。 觀尊字安於臍中。 觀禰字安兩股。
translated: Again, contemplate the syllable Li and place it on the heart.🔽Contemplate the syllable Sū and place it in the navel.🔽Contemplate the syllable Ne and place it on the two thighs.
Contemplate the syllable Sā and place it on the two calves.

original: 行人觀此尊那根本微妙字相。
analyzed: 行人觀此尊那根本微妙字相。
translated: The practitioner contemplates the subtle characteristics of the root syllables of Sūnyatā.

original: 於己身分一一分明已。🔽是人先身所作。
analyzed: 於己身分一一分明已。 是人先身所作。
translated: Having made each and every one clear on one's body parts,
All the sinful karmas created by this person's previous body can be completely eliminated.
The siddhi that is sought will definitely be accomplished.

original: 或作息災增益敬愛調伏等法。
analyzed: 或作息災增益敬愛調伏等法。
translated: Or performing the methods of pacifying, increasing, favoring, subduing, and so forth,
The great mantras recited are each different.
The great mantra recited for performing the method of pacifying is:

original: 唵引左隷引一祖隷引二尊禰引莎引賀引三作增益法所誦大明曰。🔽唵引左隷引一祖隷引二尊禰引冒沙吒半三作敬愛法大明曰。
analyzed: 唵引左隷引一祖隷引二尊禰引莎引賀引三作增益法所誦大明曰。 唵引左隷引一祖隷引二尊禰引冒沙吒半三作敬愛法大明曰。
translated: Oṃ jaṭi jaṭi janaṃ svāhā.🔽Oṃ jaṭi jaṭi janaṃ moṣadhaṃ.

original: 唵引左隷引一祖隷引二尊禰引曩莫三作調伏法大明曰。
analyzed: 唵引左隷引一祖隷引二尊禰引曩莫三作調伏法大明曰。
translated: Oṃ jaṭi jaṭi janaṃ namāḥ.🔽Oṃ jaṭi jaṭi janaṃ hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: 唵引左隷引一祖隷引二尊禰引𠺁呬吽𠷑吒半音三若作如上四法。
analyzed: 唵引左隷引一祖隷引二尊禰引𠺁呬吽𠷑吒半音三若作如上四法。
translated: If one performs the above four methods,

original: 必須請召本尊及眾賢聖。
analyzed: 必須請召本尊及眾賢聖。
translated: one must invite the principal deity and all the sages.
After completing the ritual, one should dismiss them.

original: 句召大明曰。🔽唵引左隷引一祖隷引二尊禰引紇哩二合引三發遣大明曰。
analyzed: 句召大明曰。 唵引左隷引一祖隷引二尊禰引紇哩二合引三發遣大明曰。
translated: The mantra for summoning is:🔽Oṃ jaṭi jaṭi janaṃ hri.🔽The mantra for dismissing is:🔽Oṃ jaṭi jaṭi janaṃ hūṃ.

original: 唵引左隷引一祖隷引二尊禰引吽引三復次行人作曼拏羅時。
analyzed: 唵引左隷引一祖隷引二尊禰引吽引三復次行人作曼拏羅時。
translated: Next, when the practitioner creates the maṇḍala,

original: 欲請本尊及句召壇中賢聖者。
analyzed: 欲請本尊及句召壇中賢聖者。
translated: If you wish to invite the principal deity and the sages in the mandala,

original: 先誦枳里枳里金剛大明而作潔淨。
analyzed: 先誦枳里枳里金剛大明而作潔淨。
translated: first recite the great mantra of Kirī Kirī Vajra to purify.
The great mantra states:🔽Oṃ kirī kirī vajra hūṃ phaṭ

original: 唵引枳里枳里一嚩日囉二合吽引癹吒半音二誦此明作潔淨已。
analyzed: 唵引枳里枳里一嚩日囉二合吽引癹吒半音二誦此明作潔淨已。
translated: Having recited this mantra to purify,

original: 行人觀想本尊尊那菩薩。
analyzed: 行人觀想本尊尊那菩薩。
translated: the practitioner visualizes the principal deity,尊那菩薩,
descending from the highest heaven,
entering the mandala,

original: 又想曼拏羅中有師子之座。
analyzed: 又想曼拏羅中有師子之座。
translated: and further visualizing a lion throne in the mandala,
with lotus flowers everywhere and various adornments.

original: 即結獻座印及誦獻座明。
analyzed: 即結獻座印及誦獻座明。
translated: Then form the seat-offering mudrā and recite the seat-offering mantra.
After inviting the Bodhisattva to sit,
form the Bodhisattva's root mudrā,

original: 及誦根本大明供養菩薩。
analyzed: 及誦根本大明供養菩薩。
translated: and recite the root great mantra to make offerings to the Bodhisattva.
The practitioner then says, Welcome, Bodhisattva,

original: 及獻閼伽等。🔽然後作法持誦。
analyzed: 及獻閼伽等。 然後作法持誦。
translated: and offers argha and so forth.🔽Then perform the ritual and recite the mantra.

original: 又復行人依法作曼拏羅。
analyzed: 又復行人依法作曼拏羅。
translated: Moreover, the practitioner creates the maṇḍala according to the Dharma,
and after forming the boundary and sprinkling for purification,
The practitioner, in front of the maṇḍala,
Sits upright and with right mindfulness, performing visualization.
Visualize the subtle syllable wheel at the root in front,
Arranging the various parts of the body.

original: 初想一切如來在於頂上。
analyzed: 初想一切如來在於頂上。
translated: First visualize all tathāgatas above the head.
When performing this visualization, use the samādhi mudrā.
Next, visualize the syllable za in the two eyes.
Use the Buddha eye mudrā.

original: 又想此字轉變成輪王有大力勢。
analyzed: 又想此字轉變成輪王有大力勢。
translated: Also visualize this syllable transforming into a wheel-turning king with great power.

original: 次想隷字作黑色在於項頸用結螺印。
analyzed: 次想隷字作黑色在於項頸用結螺印。
translated: Next, visualize the syllable li in black color on the neck, using the conch mudrā.

original: 即轉變成大忿怒不動尊明王。
analyzed: 即轉變成大忿怒不動尊明王。
translated: It then transforms into the great wrathful Acala vidyārāja.
Holding a sword and a lasso in the hands.
Next, visualize the syllable tsu appearing above the heart.

original: 即變成佛身作赤色有四臂。
analyzed: 即變成佛身作赤色有四臂。
translated: It transforms into a Buddha body, red in color with four arms.
The two hands form the gesture of joining palms in reverence.

original: 二手作說法印降伏諸魔相。
analyzed: 二手作說法印降伏諸魔相。
translated: The two hands form the dharmacakra mudrā, the gesture of subduing māras.
Again, visualize the syllable li appearing on the two arms.
Use the śāstika mudrā.

original: 一臂上變成不空羂索菩薩。
analyzed: 一臂上變成不空羂索菩薩。
translated: One arm transforms into Avalokiteśvara Bodhisattva.
The face has three eyes.

original: 一臂上變成觀自在菩薩。
analyzed: 一臂上變成觀自在菩薩。
translated: One arm transforms into Avalokiteśvara Bodhisattva.
The body is yellow in color.
Next, visualize the syllable zun appearing in the navel wheel.
Use the original mudrā of Zunna.
Transform into the principal deity Zunna Bodhisattva.
If visualizing the eighteen-armed form, the body is white in color.
If visualizing the six-armed form, the body is yellow in color.
If visualizing the four-armed form, the body is red in color.
Once the visualized form becomes apparent,

original: 想此菩薩能於三界作大利益。
analyzed: 想此菩薩能於三界作大利益。
translated: visualize this bodhisattva able to bring great benefit to the three realms.
Next, visualize the syllable ni appearing on the two thighs.
Use the auspicious mudrā.
Immediately transform into buddhas and bodhisattvas.
Able to accomplish all matters.
Next, visualize the syllable sa appearing on the two calves.
Again use the conch mudrā and sword mudrā.

original: 左腨上變成仡囉賀覲禰。
analyzed: 左腨上變成仡囉賀覲禰。
translated: On the left calf, it transforms into Gṛhādhipati.
On the right calf, it transforms into Rādhe.
Next, visualize the letter Ha appearing on both feet.
Use the lotus flower mudrā.

original: 即變成嚩日囉曩契明王。
analyzed: 即變成嚩日囉曩契明王。
translated: It then transforms into Vajranāṭī Śūlamātṛkā.
Holding a lasso in the hand.

original: 次用佛眼菩薩印及佛眼菩薩大明。
analyzed: 次用佛眼菩薩印及佛眼菩薩大明。
translated: Next, use the mudrā and mahāvidyā of Buddha Eye Bodhisattva.
Empower the five places.
The vidyā states:

original: 唵引嚕嚕娑普二合囉一入嚩二合攞底瑟吒二合引二悉馱路左儞引三薩哩嚩二合引哩他二合娑引達儞娑嚩二合引賀引四復次行人作觀智已。
analyzed: 唵引嚕嚕娑普二合囉一入嚩二合攞底瑟吒二合引二悉馱路左儞引三薩哩嚩二合引哩他二合娑引達儞娑嚩二合引賀引四復次行人作觀智已。
translated: Oṃ lulu suprapta 1 anvala dīpta 2 siddha rocani 3 sarva ṛta sādhya ni svāhā 4 Next, the practitioner, having contemplated with wisdom,

original: 從座起立作合掌頂禮印。
analyzed: 從座起立作合掌頂禮印。
translated: Arises from the seat, stands, forms the añjali añjali mudrā,
And recites the mahāvidyā, saying:

original: 曩莫颯鉢多二合喃引一三藐訖三二合沒馱俱胝喃引二曩莫左隷引三尊禰引曩莫四此大明力能破眾魔。
analyzed: 曩莫颯鉢多二合喃引一三藐訖三二合沒馱俱胝喃引二曩莫左隷引三尊禰引曩莫四此大明力能破眾魔。
translated: Namo ratna-trayāya, namo buddhāya, namaḥ dharmāya, namaḥ saṅghāya. By the power of this mahāvidyā, one can destroy various māras.

original: 無有魔及魔天敢違逆者。
analyzed: 無有魔及魔天敢違逆者。
translated: There is no māra or māra deity who dares to violate it.
Next, use the dismissal mudrā to dismiss all demons.
Cause the practitioner to have no difficulties.
The dismissal demon mudrā.

original: 以左手展舒作搖動令去勢。
analyzed: 以左手展舒作搖動令去勢。
translated: With the left hand extended and shaking, make the gesture of driving away.
The right hand forms the samādhi vajra.
Place it on the right side of the waist.
Step on the ground with the left foot, making a wrathful expression.
Recite the great mantra, saying:🔽Namo a-zale zu-le zun-ne hana hana matha vi-tṛṃ-sa-yu-sa-ra-ya-ta hūṃ phaṭ

original: 曩莫一阿左隷引二祖隷引三尊禰引四賀曩五那賀六摩他七尾特網二合薩踰娑引囉野多八吽引癹吒半音九次作結界印。
analyzed: 曩莫一阿左隷引二祖隷引三尊禰引四賀曩五那賀六摩他七尾特網二合薩踰娑引囉野多八吽引癹吒半音九次作結界印。
translated: Next, make the boundary-binding mudrā.

original: 以二手於虛空十方上下。
analyzed: 以二手於虛空十方上下。
translated: With both hands in the ten directions of space above and below,
Move in a swirling wind-like manner to form the mudrā.
Then recite the great mantra, saying:
